registeroptional-maywegettoknowyou: Hi %s, can we get to know you?
registeroptional-optionalexplanation: We already created your account. You are almost ready to part-up. Share some details to make your profile reliable and we can introduce you to matching part-ups.
registeroptional-form-image-import: Just use your Facebook or LinkedIn profile photo.
registeroptional-form-location_input-lab: Where do you want to join part-ups?
registeroptional-form-location_input-pla: For example in your home town or region
registeroptional-form-location_input-too: We love to introduce you to the most interesting part-ups in your area. And we think of you and the environment, so we rank nearby part-ups highest.
registeroptional-form-description-placeh: Give a short discription of who you are and what you are good at
registeroptional-form-description-toolti: Other uppers would like to know who they are working with. What can you tell them about you? Promote yourself by being honest.
registeroptional-form-tags_input-label: What you like to do and are good at in (five) keywords
registeroptional-form-tags_input-tooltip: We use these words to start matching you with interesting part-ups. So pick words that are about your contribution to part-ups. There is no need for perfection, we will update your profile with your actual contributions to part-ups.
registeroptional-form-socials-tooltip: Your social media profiles show who you are and what you are good at. Other uppers can get to know you a little.
registeroptional-form-website-label: Do you have a website or blog?
registeroptional-form-phonenumber-label: Is it okay for other uppers to call (or text) you?
registeroptional-form-phonenumber-toolti: Availability is important in working together. Privacy as well. That's why we only share your phone number with your partners. They are the uppers you work with.
registeroptional-form-skype-tooltip: Just like your phone number, we only share your Skype name with your partners. They are the uppers you work with.
